metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1684 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The ASF_ReadObject_file_properties function in modules/demux/asf/libasf.c in the ASF Demuxer in VideoLAN VLC Media Player before 2.1.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (divide-by-zero error and crash) via a zero minimum and maximum data packet size in an ASF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1684` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvlc5 - 2.1.4-1
libvlccore8 - 2.1.4-1
vlc - 2.1.4-1
vlc-data - 2.1.4-1
vlc-nox - 2.1.4-1
vlc-plugin-fluidsynth - 2.1.4-1
vlc-plugin-jack - 2.1.4-1
vlc-plugin-notify - 2.1.4-1
vlc-plugin-samba - 2.1.4-1
vlc-plugin-sdl - 2.1.4-1
vlc-plugin-svg - 2.1.4-1
vlc-plugin-zvbi - 2.1.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vlc package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.4-1').
